Classes

class  GameLogic
 GameLogic class handles all the logical things such as processing the keys recieved from GameControls, the main game logic of reduction of score, contact with physics engine to query status and the important GL functions of initialize,paint and resize functions. This acts as the hub between Physics engine and the controls classes.Inherits QGLWidget. More...
